metadata.title: CVE-2017-11104 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Knot DNS before 2.4.5 and 2.5.x before 2.5.2 contains a flaw within theTSIG protocol implementation that would allow an attacker with a valid keyname and algorithm to bypass TSIG authentication if no additional ACLrestrictions are set, because of an improper TSIG validity period check.

criterions.comment: knot package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
